autumn.util

Class FileIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • autumn.util.FileIO

  • public final class FileIO
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a few static utility methods for dealing with files.

    Warning: This class is still under development.

    • Method Detail

      • filesOf

        public static java.lang.Iterable<java.io.File> filesOf(java.io.File root,
                                       boolean recur)
        This method creates an iterable whose iterator can iterate over all the files in a directory.

        If recur is true, sub-directories will be returned before their contents.

        Parameters:
        root - is the directory to iterate over.
        recur - is true, if the sub-directories transversed.
        Returns:
        the aforedescribed iterator.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if root is not a directory.

      • writeText

        public static void writeText(java.io.File file,
             java.lang.CharSequence data)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        This method sets the contents of a text file.

        This method uses the default encoding.

        Parameters:
        file - is the path to the text file.
        data - is value to assign to the text file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong.

      • writeText

        public static void writeText(java.io.File file,
             java.lang.CharSequence data,
             java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        This method sets the contents of a text file.
        Parameters:
        file - is the path to the text file.
        data - is value to assign to the text file.
        charset - is the encoding to use.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong.

      • writeLines

        public static void writeLines(java.io.File file,
              java.lang.Iterable<? extends java.lang.CharSequence> lines,
              java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        This method sets the contents of a text file.
        Parameters:
        file - is the path to the text file.
        lines - are the lines of data to assign to the text file.
        charset - is the encoding to use.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong.
